article.title: Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
John Holman

Director, Pacific Islands
U.S. and Foreign Commercial Service
United States Department of Commerce
p. 808.522.8041 |John.Holman@trade.gov

Hawaii Export Assistance Center

Hawaii Foreign Trade Zone #9
521 Ala Moana Blvd. #214
Honolulu, HI 96813


Hawaii Pacific Export Council

Also, please visit our partner the Hawaii Pacific Export Council at http://www.globalexportsupport.com​. The mission of the Hawaii Pacific Export Council is to promote U.S. exports from Hawaii and the U.S. Pacific Islands by supporting the U.S. Commercial Service, counseling businesses on the exporting process, and conducting trade education.​

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30​​am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Hawaii U.S. Export Assistance Center.
